The site is located on Peterwood Way, which is accessed off Beddington Farm Road which connects with the A23 Purley Way. The A23 provides swift access to Central London approximately 10 miles to the north and the M25/M23 interchange (Junction 7) approximately 9 miles to the south.

The immediate area is home to a wide range of occupiers, including: Asda, ikea, Makro, Robins & Day Vauxhall, Wickes, McDonalds, Decathlon, Valley Park Retail Area, Northgate Vehicle Hire, tk Maxx, Sainsbury\'s and many more.

Accommodation:
The self-contained yard benefits from hard surfacing and a secure gated & self contained entrance off Peterwood Way with a total size of 0.42 acres.

Given the layout the site would be suitable for a number of different uses.

The site has drainage, and power can be supplied at a further cost.

Size:
The site has the following approximate areas:
18,209sq.ft 0.42 Acres

Use:
It is understood that the land can be used for storage and car parking. Further information available, with alternative uses considered.
